<<<<<<< HEAD
Hymns compos'd for the celebration of the holy ordinance of baptism By Joseph Stennett. Stennett, Joseph, 1663-1713.
The second edition.
[2], 16 p.
printed for John Marshall, at the Bible in Grace-church-street, London : [1725?]
After imprint: Price 2 d. A re-issue of pages from the first edition, dated 1712, with an added undated title page for the second edition. Wing conjectures imprint date of 1697?. With marginal notes. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

After imprint: Price 2 d. A re-issue of pages from the first edition, dated 1712, with an added undated title page for the second edition. Wing conjectures imprint date of 1697?. With marginal notes. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
